channel.title: iot on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in iot on Barefoot Rob

item.title: My first Thing of Internet
item.description: 10:44 Monday 16 January 2017 JST I’m considering my first IoT device, or ToI, Thing of Internet. To add a bit of information to my journal, I’m considering getting a programmable Amazon Button which I plan to keep by my bed. Click once in the morning when I wake up and it will fire off some code on AWS to write a journal entry “I woke up.” Doublieclick at night and it will write a journal entry like “zzzz”
